title: r/Maliciouscompliance I Caught My Boss Stealing $1,000,000 And Banging The Secretary
description: r/Maliciouscompliance Ijn today's episode, OP is an accountant at a huge corporation. She notices a discrepancy in the numbers and realizes that somebody is embezzling a huge amount of money from the company. She tries to report it, but her boss shuts her down. A short while later the boss fires OP and requests that she do an exit interview. You want an exit interview, boss? Sure thing! I'll be sure to tell them all about how you stole $1,000,000 from the company!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
